emuInput.TitMainTitle: Boxer Ezzard Charles posed with children wearing "Cheers for Charles" sashes, including Ethel Holt, Jacqueline Holyfield, Chestina Mallory, Barbara Jackson, Ernestine Allen, Johnnie Allen, Donald Smith, and possibly Carl Redwood Jr. on left, in Ligonier High School gymnasium
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 21, 1951, pg. 19, reads: "Feeling Ex-Champs' Muscles - Ezzard Charles gets a kick out of showing off his muscles to admiring teen-agers of Hill City, all members of the 'Cheers for Charles' club. The youngsters journeyed sixty miles to the Ligonier (Pa.) High School just to watch the champ in action.  So anxious were they to go, each cancelled elaborate plans that had been made for them to attend the circus.  When Charles heard his he broke a role and posed with them.  Left to right: Ethel Holt, Jacqueline Holyfield, Chestina Mallory, Barbara Jackson, Ernestine Allen, Johnnie Allen and Donald Smith. - Harris Photo."
